akn:section.akn:heading: Art. 5. Territorial applicability of this chapter

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 805. Art. 5. Territorial applicability of this chapter This chapter applies in all places. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 39.)
Historical and Revision Notes
Revised sectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
80550:555.May 5, 1950, ch. 169, § 1 (Art. 5), 64 Stat. 110.
The word “applies” is substituted for the words “shall be applicable”.
